 

Chef wants to hire a new assistant. He published an advertisement regarding that in a newspaper. After seeing the advertisement, Sakshi, Jhilmil and PrabhSimran have applied for the job. Now chef wants to shortlist people for the interview , so he gave all of them one problem which they have to solve to get shortlisted.

 

PROBLEM

Candidates are provided with an array of integers (A1,A2…..Ap) for which each element of the array is to be listed from 1 to the Ai(th) in binary form.

 

INPUT

The first line of the input contains an integer T, denoting number of test cases.
First line of each test case have an integer P, denoting the size of the array.
Second line of each test case is an array of space separated integers (A1,A2,….. Ap) containing elements to encrypt.

 

Output
For each test case , every element of the array has to be listed from 1 to Ai(th) in binary form..

Constraints
1<=T<=1800

1<=P<=50

 

Example
Input:

2
3
1 2 3 
2
2 4



Output:

1 1 10 1 10 11
1 10 1 10 11 100


 

Explanation
Example case 1. 
 Print binary of 1 =1. Binary of 2 =10 ; so print binary numbers from 1 to 2. Binary of 3 =11 ; so print binary numbers from 1 to 3. So the answer is 1 1 10 1 10 11.
